001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.rpc;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
004import org.bitcoinj.base.Address;
005import org.bitcoinj.base.Coin;
006import org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo.BlockChainInfo;
007import org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo.NetworkInfo;
008import org.bitcoinj.base.Sha256Hash;
009import org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo.SignedRawTransaction;
010import org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo.UnspentOutput;
011
012import java.util.List;
013import java.util.Map;
014import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
015
016/**
017 * Standard Bitcoin JSON-RPC API RPCs. For now, this is a subset implementation that is not fully-compatible
018 * with Bitcoin Core. Some parameters are missing and the defined response types may omit some properties.
019 * <p>
020 * All parameters are object types so {@code null} can be used to represent an omitted optional parameter.
021 */
022public interface BitcoinJsonRpc {
023    int DEFAULT_MIN_CONF = 1;
024    int DEFAULT_MAX_CONF = 9999999;
025
026    /* == Blockchain == */
027
028    CompletableFuture<Sha256Hash> getbestblockhash();
029    // TODO: Support Sha256Hash type in request params: see Issue #104
030//  CompletableFuture<Object> getblock(Sha256Hash blockHash, Integer verbosity);
031    CompletableFuture<JsonNode> getblock(String blockHashString, Integer verbosity);
032    CompletableFuture<BlockChainInfo> getblockchaininfo();
033    CompletableFuture<Integer> getblockcount();
034    CompletableFuture<Sha256Hash> getblockhash(Integer blockNumber);
035    CompletableFuture<JsonNode> getblockheader(String blockHashString, Boolean verbose);
036
037    /* == Control == */
038
039    CompletableFuture<String> help();
040    CompletableFuture<String> stop();
041
042    /* == Network == */
043
044    CompletableFuture<Integer> getconnectioncount();
045    CompletableFuture<NetworkInfo> getnetworkinfo();
046
047    /* == Rawtransactions == */
048
049    CompletableFuture<String> createrawtransaction(List<Map<String, Object>> inputs, List<Map<String, String>> outputs);
050    CompletableFuture<Sha256Hash> sendrawtransaction(String hex);
051
052    /* == Wallet == */
053
054    CompletableFuture<Coin> getbalance();
055    CompletableFuture<Address> getnewaddress();
056    CompletableFuture<List<UnspentOutput>> listunspent(Integer minConf, Integer maxConf, List<String> addresses, Boolean includeUnsafe);
057    CompletableFuture<Sha256Hash> sendtoaddress(String address, Double amount);
058
059    // TODO: Add prevtxs and sighashtype parameters
060    /**
061     * Currently all UTXOs must be present in the wallet and {@code sighashtype} defaults to {@code "ALL"}.
062     * @param hex hex-encoded unsigned raw transaction
063     * @return An object containing the signed transaction
064     */
065    CompletableFuture<SignedRawTransaction> signrawtransactionwithwallet(String hex);
066}
